underlying_goal: Fix image attachment and publishing issues for tweets and threads in the NS-1137 feature implementation, including image rendering, image upload during publishing, and thread posting
friction_detail: Claude initially diagnosed the media upload 403 as a Twitter API tier limitation rather than investigating further, though this may have been correct.
brief_summary: User needed to fix image rendering and publishing in tweet/thread UI; Claude fixed frontend image URL conversion and backend storage path handling, resolved thread posting, but media upload hit a Twitter API 403 that remained unresolved.
